title: Match Up
text: Match up the decimal points, adding zeroes as placeholders. In this case, we write the expression as $$4.8+11.69$$.
speech: Match up the decimal points, adding zeroes as placeholders. In this case, we write the expression as  4.8 plus 11.69 .
pacedSpeech: Match up the decimal points, adding zeroes as placeholders. In this case, we write the expression as   4.8 plus 11.69

title: Add
text: Add the numbers as if they were whole numbers.
speech: Add the numbers as if they were whole numbers.
pacedSpeech: Add the numbers as if they were whole numbers.

title: Add
text: What is $$480+1169$$? Remember to carry when needed.
speech: What is  480 plus 1169, ? Remember to carry when needed.

title: Putting Decimal Point
text: Place the decimal point in the sum at the same place as where it is in the given numbers, which gives us $$16.49$$.
speech: Place the decimal point in the sum at the same place as where it is in the given numbers, which gives us  16.49 .
